ops.description: addPaletteColors_0xe9({sourcePaletteId:0, targetPaletteId:8, r:0, g:15, b:0, size:127});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:9}); // {Tifa}
“Remember,
we're here to save
{Aeris}.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:6}); // {Barret}
“When those guards turn around,
MOVE!”
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:7}); Bank[6][17] = pos.x; Bank[6][19] = pos.y; Bank[6][21] = pos.z; Bank[6][23] = pos.triangleId; }
{ let pos = getEntityPosition({entityId:7}); Bank[6][17] = pos.x; Bank[6][19] = pos.y; Bank[6][21] = pos.z; Bank[6][23] = pos.triangleId; }

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
“I shoulda known
it'd turn out like this…”{PAUSE}“If I knew it'd be
like this in the first place…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Tifa}
“Shhh!
Now let's move on.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Barret}
“What the hell're ya doin'?
Man, you gotta do it again!”
Bank[6][9] = getLastFieldMapId(); // wm does not count

dialogStrings:
“What're you doing here?
Unauthorized personnel
aren't allowed here!!”

“Your kind don't belong here!
Go on, get out!”

“Hey there!
What do you think you're doing there?”

{Barret}
“Look at all them guards
runnin' around.”{PAUSE}“{Cloud},
you go on ahead and signal us
when it's safe to move.”

{Barret}
“What the hell're ya doin'?
Man, you gotta do it again!”

{Barret}
“I shoulda known
it'd turn out like this…”{PAUSE}“If I knew it'd be
like this in the first place…”

Wait for the soldiers to turn,
then push {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE} to signal the others!
